theVacant:VacantBossEnergyRelic.NAME: Placeholder Energy Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 [E] .

theVacant:VacantStarterRelic.NAME: Wretched Gem
theVacant:VacantStarterRelic.FLAVOR: A cursed trap that contains your soul.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, if you are #ythevacant:Healthy, lose #b2 Max HP. If you are #ythevacant:Hollow, gain #b4 Max HP. You can't go below #b50 Max HP this way.

theVacant:Deathbell.NAME: Deathbell
theVacant:Deathbell.FLAVOR: This flower is said to ward off ill times and death.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your first turn, if you are #ythevacant:Hollow, gain #b10 #yTemporary_HP.

theVacant:ShroudRelic.NAME: Shroud Fragment
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b3 #ythevacant:Shroud.

theVacant:BoundSoul.NAME: Unbound Soul
theVacant:BoundSoul.FLAVOR: As death closes in, the Goblet's hold on you weakens, and you feel your power grow.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn if you are #ythevacant:Hollow.

theVacant:LocketRelic.NAME: Locket Piece
theVacant:LocketRelic.FLAVOR: A reminder of a life lost. Or at least, a piece of one.
DESCRIPTIONS: #ythevacant:Ricochet the first 2 cards you #ythevacant:Mill each combat.

theVacant:TombstoneRelic.NAME: Tombstone
theVacant:TombstoneRelic.FLAVOR: Just as we all go to the grave eventually, all cards go to the discard pile eventually.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, after you draw, #ythevacant:Mill your draw pile. Upon pickup, increase the power of your #yGoblet by #b2.

theVacant:CrystalBallRelic.NAME: Cracked Crystal Ball
theVacant:CrystalBallRelic.FLAVOR: Sometimes magic leaking into the world is more powerful than when it is contained.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play a card each turn, add a copy to your hand with #yEthereal and #yExhaust.

theVacant:Holly.NAME: Holly
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain a debuff, reduce its amount by #b1 to a minimum of #b1.

theVacant:SilkTouch.NAME: Silk Touch
theVacant:SilkTouch.FLAVOR: Swinging from side to side, side-side to side.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you #ythevacant:Mine a #ythevacant:Gem each turn, trigger its effect without reducing its size.

theVacant:RagRelic.NAME: Polishing Rag
theVacant:RagRelic.FLAVOR: Shiny gems are more powerful, everyone knows this.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, increase the size of your #b3 rightmost #ythevacant:Gems.

theVacant:BrassGoblet.NAME: Brass Goblet
theVacant:BrassGoblet.FLAVOR: An ancient artifact with dark power.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b
#pthevacant:Void.

theVacant:EnshroudedBrassGoblet.NAME: Enshrouded Goblet
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b
#pthevacant:Void and #b
#ythevacant:Shroud.

theVacant:OverflowingGobletRelic.NAME: Overflowing Goblet
theVacant:OverflowingGobletRelic.FLAVOR: An ancient artifact, now overflowing with dark power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yBrass #yGoblet. At the start of combat, draw #b
cards and gain #b
#yArtifact.

theVacant:EnshroudedOverflowingGobletRel.NAME: Overshrouded Goblet
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #pEnshrouded #pGoblet. At the start of combat, gain #b
#pthevacant:Void, #yArtifact, and #ythevacant:Shroud, and draw #b
cards.

theVacant:BoundSoulOld.NAME: Bound Soul Old
DESCRIPTIONS: Enter [#66eeee]Solemn[] [#66eeee]Form[] at the start of a turn if you are above half HP. NL Enter [#ee4200]Fury[] [#ee4200]Form[] when you take damage. NL Enter [#ee82ee]Void[] [#ee82ee]Form[] when your draw pile contains 0 cards.
